entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 19 Oct 2023 08:03:34
entry.summary:
Tech:

- Harlan Crow, the GOP megadonor and pal to Clarence Thomas, maxed out his campaign donation to a self-described 'non-Marxist socialist' trying to defeat Joe Biden

AI:

Other:
- "A long time coming" - The New Era - Sweet Home New Era
- Damian Perkins Obituary - O. W. Wiley Mortuary - Houston - 2023 - Legacy.com

- Aftermath images from the Gaza hospital explosion are 'inconsistent' with an Israeli airstrike, former UN war crimes investigator says

Insights:
- The tech section includes news about promotions, financial products, and developments in the tech industry.
- The business section covers funding, company closures, societal trends, and interviews with successful entrepreneurs.
- The AI section highlights the negative impact of space exploration on Earth's atmosphere.
- The other section consists of various topics such as obituaries, legal proceedings, archaeological discoveries, art, music, and social issues.
- Overall, the report provides a diverse range of news and insights across different categories.
